text: “apa ge paramadhipatiyanani! tava da oba ge væki ovuna ta parayanaya kara pen vana, deva granthaya ha pragna va ovuna ta ugan vana, ovun va pivituru karana, ovungen ma vu dharma dutayeku ovun atara ta evanu mænava! sæbævin ma sarva baladhari maha pragnavanta vanne obama ya.” (yanuven ibrahim nabi tuma prarthana kalaha)
